评论概述: My go-to shirt for a casual look
评论详情: The color is exactly as pictured. It is a loose fit, not too thick but not too thin, and very comfortable. As a SAHM/homeschool mom, I love being able to throw this shirt on with some leggings or jeans. It looks much nicer than just a plain old t-shirt without sacrificing the comfort of a t-shirt. It looks much more put together, but not too dressy if you’re just lounging around at home. I would say that if you’re wearing this shirt with a larger jacket in cold weather, it may feel a little stuffed due to the oversized fit of this shirt, but it’s perfect for cooler weather that doesn’t require outerwear.

Review: TERIVEEK Women’s Oversized Striped Sweatshirt  The TERIVEEK Oversized Striped Sweatshirt is a stylish and comfortable choice for casual wear. The color block design gives it a trendy, Y2K-inspired look, and the loose fit makes it perfect for layering. The fabric is soft and lightweight, great for everyday wear, though it’s not super thick for colder weather. The length is just right—long enough for a relaxed fit without being too baggy. Overall, it’s a cute, comfy, and versatile pullover for a casual, laid-back style!  Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

评论概述: Great colors, light weight, well made
评论详情: I bought this after trying (and returning) the FP version. The arms on theirs were soooo long and I love oversized clothes.  This one is light weight and the hangs well. Great colors combination and seems well made. I prefer this to the FP one.

评论概述: Decent top but wouldn’t call it it an exact dupe
评论详情: The shirt is exactly as pictured, which I appreciate. Visually it is very close to the FP top, but the quality and structure isn’t even in the same ballpark (I have both this and the Free People one). This one is heavier, doesn’t drape effortlessly, isn’t super soft, and the bottom is more cinched (even with it being oversized). If you’re looking to get this purely as a dupe, this is fine enough but couldn’t pass as the “real thing”. Obviously the prices between the original and this are vastly different, but if you really love this style and can swing the FP price tag, I’d 100% recommend the original. If you’re just looking for an oversized long-sleeve, and like the stripes/colors, then this is a good top.
It is much thinner than the real free people outfit. I am sending back.  You get what you pay for.

I wouldn’t say this a fp dupe. BUT with that being said it is because of the material. That’s the only reason. We all know the fp material tends to be thicker and heavier. This is lightweight and just the right thickness! I actually love this one more! The colors are beautiful and vibrant! It does have some stretch to it. I love this sweater and will be ordering more colors!
